description.text: SQL Server 2008 Service Pack 3 upgrades all builds of SQL Server 2008 and the components installed by SQL Server 2008 setup. The service pack may be applied to all editions of SQL Server 2008 and can upgrade any instances of SQL Server 2008 resident in your local system. If additional installation options are needed, please download Service Pack 3 from the Microsoft Download Center. For more information about the SQL Server 2008 Service Pack 3 Package please visit the Microsoft Knowledge Base Article 2546951.
